name: Goons
description:
Oh no, there are so many Goons! And they are all coming for you! There is only one thing you can do obviously. Turn them into various weapons of mass-destruction such as...an egg?!

'Goons' is a survival-like arena game, where you have to kill all the enemies that spawn from various points on the map. To kill them, use your environment to your advantage! With glorious ragdoll physics, this game is a real piece of pure fun for your casual needs.
